nodes.documentation:
Constructor which:
allocates the initial supply
maps the key that is the address (msg.sender) with the value of the initial supply
msg.sender corresponds to the account which deploys the contract
sg is a global variable that has several different values that we can read from
ender is the address of who call the function
Function which allows to transfer a certain amount of token (_value) to a recipient (_to)
nodes.name: transfer

nodes.documentation: Function which allows _spender to withdraw from the owner's account multiple times, up to the _value amount
nodes.name: approve

nodes.documentation: Function which transfers _value amount of tokens from address _from to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event
nodes.name: transferFrom
